rows.label: qev051505_MSG0001
rows.name:
I always wanted to try fighting the people of this city,
so I borrowed the shape of your kind and entered the
tournament.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051505_MSG0002
rows.name:
Never did I think I would wind up fighting you! Ha!
It is a strange connection we share, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051505_MSG0003
rows.name:
...Hmm? How's that? You don't recognize me?
Well, I guess that's to be expected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051505_MSG0004
rows.name: I can't exactly show my true form here, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051505_MSG0006
rows.name: Tell you what. If you win, I'll tell you who I really am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051505_MSG0007
rows.name:
I know you're strong, but I won't go down easily.
I've been through my share of tight scrapes as a
BLADE, after all![ST:wait ]
